0.title: The Ghost of Time

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

0.plot: Tiffany finally meets the man she has been looking for, but this is all turned into disaster after the Doctor and Tiffany discover a frightening prophecy.

1.title: Attack of the Kamolians

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

1.plot: When Tyler Gersham discovers a glowing crystal in his flowerbed a spaceship arrives above his house and a stranger warns him to run away and never come back.

2.title: The Frozen Earth

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

2.plot: Earth is in the midst of an ice age - even though it shouldn't go through another one for another thousand years. The last few survivors are desperately trying to find a solution to their problem but something out there is killing them off one by one.

3.title: Origins of the Dark Doctor

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

3.plot: The Doctor explains to his companion how his dark nature has overtaken him.

4.title: Revenge of Thantos

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

4.plot: Tiffany comes home from town and is amazed to see the Doctor outside her house, but this is no social call - the wheels of fate will now start to turn as their meeting fulfills a prophecy of doom - Meanwhile General Templeton is having problems of his own, he has released Thanatos, an alien with almighty powers.

5.title: The Doctor's Sacrifice: Part One

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

5.plot: As usual, the TARDIS brings the Doctor, Tiffany and Eric to the wrong place but while they try to find out where they have landed they discover a terrible secret in a nearby house, a house with eyes on the walls and something deadly hidden in the basement which is about to escape captivity.

6.title: The Doctor's Sacrifice: Part Two

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

6.plot: With the Doctor trapped in the past, the TARDIS crew must find a way to get to him.

7.title: Lost in Sub-Space

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

7.plot: The Doctor and Eric venture into sub-space by accident and meet a fellow traveller on the way.

8.title: Alzura

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

8.plot: Young Alzura was born gifted with psychic abilities and Tallius, a powerful demon, wants to takeover and use these powers for evil. Can the newly regenerated Doctor even survive his post-regenerative trauma and help Alzura fight her inner demon?

9.title: Terror of the Ceraphoyd

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

9.plot: Commander Eric Templeton is on a mission to get to the bottom of mysterious incidents along the Scottish coast, a chance encounter with the Doctor could prove fatal for him and indeed the rest of humanity as the Ceraphoyd grows in power.

10.title: Daxter's Hundreds

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

10.plot: The Doctor and his companions Alzura and Eric Templeton are on the run from soldiers, they find cover in an underground bunker where they discover something terrible has happened. A fun holiday has turned into a desperate rescue mission.

-1.title: Attack of the Kamolians (Pilot)

episode of.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (TV Series 2007–2015)

-1.plot: Tyler begins his day as normal but is interrupted by static interference, a spaceship hovers over his house, the aliens inside want to collect something taken from them years ago, and it's hidden under Tyler's house.

imdb.title: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor
akas: Doctor Who: Parallel Thirteenth Doctor (United Kingdom)
plot: The final incarnation of the Parallel Doctor is finally here. The Doctor must face his demons once and for all.::Sebastian Bird
